description: This file defines the BabyNameRepository class which manages data operations for baby names, including fetching, searching with filters, and retrieving distinct starting characters based on language. It interacts with a SQLite database via the sqflite package and uses models like BabyName, Gender, Language, and Rashi.

classes.name: BabyNameRepository
classes.description: Repository class for baby name data operations, providing methods for fetching, searching, and filtering baby names from the database.

methods.name: getAllNames
methods.description: Retrieves all baby names from the database.

methods.name: searchNames
methods.description: Searches for baby names based on multiple optional filters such as search query, gender, language, rashi, and starting character.

methods.name: getNamesByGender
methods.description: Fetches baby names filtered by a specific gender.

methods.name: getNamesByLanguage
methods.description: Fetches baby names filtered by a specific language.

methods.name: getNamesByRashi
methods.description: Fetches baby names filtered by a specific rashi.

methods.name: getNameById
methods.description: Retrieves a baby name by its unique ID.

methods.name: getStartingCharacters
methods.description: Fetches distinct starting characters for baby names in a specified language.
